item.description: Okey, so it rained and I got a little lost in spots, Bill and I had a great hike going from Athol into South Royalston and a small section of Winchendon exploring Millers and Birch Hill and Otter River. I'd like to continue to explore the area, maybe something shorter like east on Gulf Road, north on Paine Swamp going up towards Doanes Falls, then along Lawrence Brook and back down to Gulf via Gales Hill. I could get an afternoon off this week (any day but Tuesday) if anyone's up for a little adventure. I have maps and a GPS so how lost could we get? LMK

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Explore Millers Wildlife Again
